languages.text: "Это древнее производственное строение, значительно более старое, чем сама колония. На некоторых механизмах цеха обнаружены метки эксплораторского флота Осознание. Возможно, когда-то первые Эксплораторы, осваивавшие Простор, разместили на еще не заселенной планете свою станцию, которая после была поглощена развивающейся индустриальной колонией, а затем... забыта. Может, планы ее использования были столь секретны, что смерть их творцов ввергла станцию в забвение".

"It is an ancient production facility, far older than the colony itself. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognisance Fleet. Perhaps the first Explorators who came to the Koronus Expanse set up a station on the yet uninhabited planet. The station was then consumed by the developing industrial colony and eventually... forgotten. It is possible that whatever plans they had for it were so clandestine that its creators' death ended up casting it into oblivion."
languages.original_text: "Это древнее производственное строение, значительно более старое, чем сама колония. На некоторых механизмах цеха обнаружены метки эксплораторского флота Осознание. Возможно, когда-то первые Эксплораторы, осваивавшие Простор, разместили на еще не заселенной планете свою станцию, которая после была поглощена развивающейся индустриальной колонией, а затем... забыта. Может, планы ее использования были столь секретны, что смерть их творцов ввергла станцию в забвение".

traits.locale_text: "It is an ancient production facility, one of the first buildings that were constructed on the planet. However, the scouts claim it is much larger than what the chronicles claim it to be, and many of its sectors predate the rest of the colony. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognizance Fleet."

"It is an ancient production facility, one of the first buildings that were constructed on the planet. However, the scouts claim it is much larger than what the chronicles claim it to be, and many of its sectors predate the rest of the colony. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognizance Fleet."

Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognizance Fleet."

languages.text: «Es una antigua instalación de producción, mucho más vieja que la propia colonia. Algunas cadenas de montaje llevan las marcas de la Flota Conciencia. Tal vez los primeros exploradores que vinieron a la Extensión de Koronus prepararon una estación en el planeta, que en aquel entonces estaría desierto. La estación sería consumida por el desarrollo de la colonia industrial y, con el tiempo... olvidada. Es posible que los planes que tuvieran para ella fueran tan secretos que la muerte de sus fundadores acabó condenándolos al olvido».
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient production facility, far older than the colony itself. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognisance Fleet. Perhaps the first Explorators who came to the Koronus Expanse set up a station on the yet uninhabited planet. The station was then consumed by the developing industrial colony and eventually... forgotten. It is possible that whatever plans they had for it were so clandestine that its creators' death ended up casting it into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: «Es una antigua instalación de producción, mucho más vieja que la propia colonia. Algunas cadenas de montaje llevan las marcas de la Flota Conciencia. Tal vez los primeros exploradores que vinieron a la Extensión de Koronus prepararon una estación en el planeta, que en aquel entonces estaría desierto. La estación sería consumida por el desarrollo de la colonia industrial y, con el tiempo... olvidada. Es posible que los planes que tuvieran para ella fueran tan secretos que la muerte de sus fundadores acabó condenándolos al olvido».

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'une ancienne usine, bien plus vieille que la colonie elle-même. Certaines chaînes de montage portent la marque de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Il est possible qu'à leur arrivée dans les Étendues de Koronus, les premiers Explorators aient décidé de bâtir une station sur la planète encore déserte. Les installations auraient ensuite été phagocytées par la colonie industrielle en plein développement... jusqu'à tomber dans l'oubli. On peut imaginer que ses créateurs ont voulu la garder secrète à tout prix, au point qu'elle disparaisse des mémoires après leur mort. »
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient production facility, far older than the colony itself. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognisance Fleet. Perhaps the first Explorators who came to the Koronus Expanse set up a station on the yet uninhabited planet. The station was then consumed by the developing industrial colony and eventually... forgotten. It is possible that whatever plans they had for it were so clandestine that its creators' death ended up casting it into oblivion."

Les installations auraient ensuite été phagocytées par la colonie industrielle en plein développement... jusqu'à tomber dans l'oubli. On peut imaginer que ses créateurs ont voulu la garder secrète à tout prix, au point qu'elle disparaisse des mémoires après leur mort. »

languages.text: “这是一座远古的生产设施，比这座殖民地本身还要古老。其中一部分装配线上还残留着真理开拓者舰队的标记。或许，当初是科罗努斯扩区的第一批开拓者在这个荒无人烟的行星上建起了第一座空间站。在那之后，这个空间站便被欣欣向荣的工业殖民地吞噬，最终……被人遗忘。又或许，这个空间站相关的一切资料都是绝密内容。因此，当计划发起人去世之后，整个空间站的秘密也被一同埋葬。”
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient production facility, far older than the colony itself. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognisance Fleet. Perhaps the first Explorators who came to the Koronus Expanse set up a station on the yet uninhabited planet. The station was then consumed by the developing industrial colony and eventually... forgotten. It is possible that whatever plans they had for it were so clandestine that its creators' death ended up casting it into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: “这是一座远古的生产设施，比这座殖民地本身还要古老。其中一部分装配线上还残留着真理开拓者舰队的标记。或许，当初是科罗努斯扩区的第一批开拓者在这个荒无人烟的行星上建起了第一座空间站。在那之后，这个空间站便被欣欣向荣的工业殖民地吞噬，最终……被人遗忘。又或许，这个空间站相关的一切资料都是绝密内容。因此，当计划发起人去世之后，整个空间站的秘密也被一同埋葬。”

languages.text: 「コロニーよりもはるかに古い、古代の生産施設です。いくつかの組み立てラインには、コグニサンス艦隊の痕跡が残っています。おそらく、コロヌス・エクスパンスにやってきた最初の探検艦隊が、まだ無人の惑星にステーションを設置したのでしょう。その後、ステーションは発展する工業コロニーに飲み込まれ…やがて忘れ去られた。彼らがステーションにどのような計画を立てていたとしても、それは高度に秘密裏に行われたものであり、その創造者の死によって、ステーションは忘却の彼方へと追いやられたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient production facility, far older than the colony itself. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognisance Fleet. Perhaps the first Explorators who came to the Koronus Expanse set up a station on the yet uninhabited planet. The station was then consumed by the developing industrial colony and eventually... forgotten. It is possible that whatever plans they had for it were so clandestine that its creators' death ended up casting it into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: 「コロニーよりもはるかに古い、古代の生産施設です。いくつかの組み立てラインには、コグニサンス艦隊の痕跡が残っています。おそらく、コロヌス・エクスパンスにやってきた最初の探検艦隊が、まだ無人の惑星にステーションを設置したのでしょう。その後、ステーションは発展する工業コロニーに飲み込まれ…やがて忘れ去られた。彼らがステーションにどのような計画を立てていたとしても、それは高度に秘密裏に行われたものであり、その創造者の死によって、ステーションは忘却の彼方へと追いやられたのでしょう」

languages.text: "Es ist eine uralte Produktionsanlage, deutlich älter als die Kolonie selbst. Einige Fertigungslinien tragen die Symbole der Erkenntnisflotte. Vielleicht haben die ersten Exploratoren die in die Koronus-Ausdehnung kamen, eine Station auf dem bis dahin unbewohnten Planeten errichtet. Die Station wurde dann von der sich entwickelnden industriellen Kolonie verschlungen und schließlich ... vergessen. Möglicherweise waren die ursprünglichen Pläne für die Station so geheim, dass sie durch den Tod ihrer Erbauer in Vergessenheit geraten sind."
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient production facility, far older than the colony itself. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognisance Fleet. Perhaps the first Explorators who came to the Koronus Expanse set up a station on the yet uninhabited planet. The station was then consumed by the developing industrial colony and eventually... forgotten. It is possible that whatever plans they had for it were so clandestine that its creators' death ended up casting it into oblivion."

languages.text: "Kadim bir üretim tesisi, koloniden çok daha eski. Bazı montaj hatlarında Keşiftör Filosu'nun işaretleri yer alıyormuş. Belki de Koronus Enginliği'ne gelen ilk Keşiftörler, henüz gayrimeskûn olan gezegende bir istasyon kurmuştur. Bu istasyon, sonrasında gelişen endüstriyel koloni içinde kaybolup gitmiş ve nihayet... Unutulmuş. Muhtemelen bu yerle ilgili kurulan planlar öylesine gizliymiş ki kurucularının ölümüyle birlikte hatırdan silinmiş."
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient production facility, far older than the colony itself. Some assembly lines bear the marks of the Cognisance Fleet. Perhaps the first Explorators who came to the Koronus Expanse set up a station on the yet uninhabited planet. The station was then consumed by the developing industrial colony and eventually... forgotten. It is possible that whatever plans they had for it were so clandestine that its creators' death ended up casting it into oblivion."
